entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is a referee in the Quidditch game. She is beside herself and scolding Bole and Derrick for attacking the Keeper.

entities.name: bole
entities.description: Bole is one of the players who attacked the Keeper. Madam Hooch scolded him.

entities.name: derrick
entities.description: Derrick is another player who attacked the Keeper. Madam Hooch scolded him.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina scored a goal for Gryffindor.

entities.name: fred weasley
entities.description: Fred Weasley pelted a Bludger at Warrington, knocking the Quaffle out of his hands.

entities.name: warrington
entities.description: Warrington had the Quaffle knocked out of his hands by Fred Weasley.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia seized the Quaffle and put it through the Slytherin goal.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a player who is trying to catch the Snitch. He has hundreds of eyes following him.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is speeding along behind Harry.

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The Snitch is a sparkling object that Harry is trying to catch.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is the referee who scolded Bole and Derrick.
